title: Patch Time- Please Help
body:
So i went to update the game and all it has done is sit at 33% and scan files? its got'en up to 10,312 files scaned and nothing has happened

Is this normal because of the size of the patch or is something wrong?

replies.body:
Hey Torea2,

I just wanted to follow up with you and find out if your patch was still running. If it is, feel free to close it and try the solutions in the linked thread:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues

Please let me know if anything worked for you.
